title: Ep122: Arras Air War - The Fight Goes On
itunes:title: Ep122: Arras Air War - The Fight Goes On
description:
Pete and Gary continue the tale of the air war in 1917 as the Battle of Arras continues.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
